data.title: Billboard
data.meta_description: Billboard is the world’s most influential music brand.
data.text:
Billboard is the world’s most influential music brand. The Billboard charts are built on the most complete and well-respected database of charts across all music genres and remain the final world on success in music. Billboard tells the story of music from the inside out and taps into its universal power to move us all.

Billboard was named the No. 1 U.S. Music Media Brand in H1 2018 with 125M+ cross-platform actions across Facebook, Twitter and Instagram, surpassing music competitors such as Townsquare Media, iHeart Media, Rolling Stone, Pitchfork, The Fader and others.
